properties.entry: INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RPID.NEXTVAL , ? , DEFAULT , ? )
INSERT INTO BOARDREPORT ( BOARD_NO , REPORT_NO ) VALUES ( ? , SEQ_RPID.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO REPLYREPORT ( REPLY_NO , REPORT_NO ) VALUES ( ? , SEQ_RPID.CURRVAL )
SELECT * FROM REPORT JOIN REPLYREPORT USING (REPORT_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND REPLY_NO = ?
SELECT * FROM REPORT JOIN BOARDREPORT USING (REPORT_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND BOARD_NO = ?
